Title: Bait
Overview: A freak tsunami traps shoppers at a coastal Australian supermarket inside the building ... along with a 12-foot great white shark.
Tagline: A Tsunami Just Flipped The Foodchain.
production_companies: Pictures in Paradise, Screen Australia, Media Development Authority (MDA), Screen Queensland, Bait Productions, Story Bridge Films, Blackmagic Design Films
Cast: Sharni Vinson, Phoebe Tonkin, Julian McMahon
